{{Lang|'''Liuli Pavilion'''|zh=琉璃亭|zh_rm=Liúlí-tíng|zh_tl=Glaze Pavilion}} is the leading establishment for Li-style cuisine in [[Liyue]]. It is located in [[Liyue Harbor]], on the opposite side of [[Xinyue Kiosk]] by the stairs to [[Feiyun Slope]].

During the Archon Quest "[[An Organization Known as Wangsheng]]," [[Childe]] arranges a dinner at Liuli Pavilion to introduce the [[Traveler]] to [[Zhongli]].
